Aries.Monday: A short stranger will soon enter your life with blessings to share.
Aries.Wednesday: Keep your eye out for someone special.
Aries.Thursday: Everyone agrees. You are the best.
Aries.Friday: Be on the lookout for coming events; They cast their shadows beforehand.
Aries.Sunday: Joys are often the shadows, cast by sorrows.

Leo.Monday: You will be called in to fulfill a position of high honor and responsibility.
Leo.Tuesday: A very attractive person has a message for you.
Leo.Wednesday: Your shoes will make you happy today.
Leo.Thursday: A new voyage will fill your life with untold memories.
Leo.Friday: Love can last a lifetime, if you want it to.
Leo.Sunday: You already know the answer to the questions lingering inside your head.

Taurus.Monday: You will conquer obstacles to achieve success.
Taurus.Tuesday: When fear hurts you, conquer it and defeat it!
Taurus.Wednesday: Now is the time to try something new.
Taurus.Friday: You learn from your mistakes... You will learn a lot today.
Taurus.Sunday: It is now, and in this world, that we must live.
